mapper.select: select code_master_id as codeMasterId, code_master_nm as codeMasterNm, use_yn as useYn, crt_id as crtId, crt_dtm as crtDtm, chg_id as chgId, chg_dtm as chgDtm from tb_code_master LIMIT {pageNo}, {listCnt}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_code_master( code_master_nm, use_yn, crt_id, crt_dtm )values ( #{codeMasterNm}, #{useYn}, #{crtId}, now() )
mapper.update: update tb_code_master set code_master_nm = #{codeMasterNm}, use_yn = #{useYn}, chg_id = #{chgId}, chg_dtm = now() where code_master_id= #{codeMasterId}
